Package serverSide.sharedRegions

Definition of the shared regions and shared regions access. Static solution based on implicit monitors for synchronization. Implementation of a client-server model of type 2 (server replication). Communication is based on a communication channel under the TCP protocol.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AssaultParty
    AssaultParty (shared region)
    AssaultPartyInterface
    Interface to the AssaultParty shared region.
    ConcentrationSite
    ConcentrationSite (shared region) This class implements the concentration site All public methods are executed in mutual exclusion.
    ConcentrationSiteInterface
    Interface to the ConcentrationSite shared region.
    ControlCollectionSite
    ControlCollectionSite (shared region) This class implements the control/collection site
    ControlCollectionSiteInterface
    Interface to the Kitchen It is responsible to validate and process the incoming message, execute the corresponding method on the Kitchen and generate the outgoing message.
    GeneralRepo
    General Repository of Information It is responsible for logging the internal state of the problem in a file.
    GeneralRepoInterface
    Interface to the General Repository of Information.
    Museum
    Museum (shared region) This class implements the Museum It is responsible to keep a continuous update of the number of paintings in the museum rooms
    MuseumInterface
    Interface to the Museum.
